Package acads

Class Association

  • java.lang.Object
    • acads.Association
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAssociation, Organization, java.lang.Comparable<Association>
    public class Association
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Association>, IAssociation
    This class simulates the academic associations at BITS Pilani Chandigarh Campus.

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo​(Association assoc)
        This method makes Associations orderable. If the number of members in the association is equal to that in assoc, return 0. If the number of members in the association is greater than that in assoc, return 1. If the number of members in the association is less than that in assoc, return -1.
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<Association>
        Parameters:
        assoc - Association to compare the present Association to.
        Returns:
        0, 1 or -1 based on the above conditions

      • calculateBudget

        public int calculateBudget()
        Calculates the total budget and assigns it to budget.
        Specified by:
        calculateBudget in interface Organization
        Returns:
        The total budget (base + project).

      • extraBudget

        public int extraBudget()
        Calculate additional base budget that an academic association has when compared to Organization.
        Returns:
        The additional base budget.

      • calculateProjectBudget

        public int calculateProjectBudget()
        Specified by:
        calculateProjectBudget in interface IAssociation
        Returns:
